    • Constructor Detail

      • TriggerFactory

        public TriggerFactory()
               throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                      InterruptedException
        Constructor initializes the base elements to create multiple trigger instances. That means (1) an independent server connection to monitor the connection state between trigger interface and ontology server and (2) the rsb communication.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case at least one base element could not be initialized.
        InterruptedException - is thrown in case the thread is externally interrupted.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public Trigger newInstance(Object config)
                    throws org.openbase.jul.exception.InstantiationException,
                           InterruptedException
        Method creates a new individual trigger instance, which will be informed if there are relevant ontology changes. The method needs the trigger config.
        Specified by:
        newInstance in interface org.openbase.jul.pattern.Factory
        Parameters:
        config - is the trigger config, which includes the label, query and ontologyChange.
        Returns:
        the trigger instance.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.InstantiationException - is thrown in case the input is invalid (null or bad query) or the trigger could not activated.
        InterruptedException - is thrown in case the thread is externally interrupted.

      • newInstance

        public Trigger newInstance(String label,
                           String query)
                    throws org.openbase.jul.exception.InstantiationException,
                           InterruptedException
        Method creates a new individual trigger instance, which will be informed if there are relevant ontology changes. The method needs label and query of the trigger only. The ontologyChange will be parsed from the input query.
        Parameters:
        label - is the label of the trigger.
        query - is the query of the trigger.
        Returns:
        the trigger instance.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.InstantiationException - is thrown in case the input is invalid (null or bad query) or the trigger could not activated.
        InterruptedException - is thrown in case the thread is externally interrupted.

      • getOntologyChange

        public rst.domotic.ontology.OntologyChangeType.OntologyChange getOntologyChange(String label,
                                                                                String query)
                                                                         throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException,
                                                                                org.openbase.jul.exception.MultiException
        Method creates an individual ontologyChange for the input query string (of the trigger with input label). The ontologyChange contains three types of change values, which aggregate to (1) change categories, (2) service types and (3) unit types. Consider: the query string should not contain any negation phrase, because of the parse complexity.
        Parameters:
        label - is the label of the trigger.
        query - is the query of the trigger.
        Returns:
        the ontologyChange with change categories, service types and unit types.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input label or query is null.
        org.openbase.jul.exception.MultiException - is thrown in case the ontologyChange could not be parsed from the input query.

      • buildTriggerConfig

        public rst.domotic.ontology.TriggerConfigType.TriggerConfig buildTriggerConfig(String label,
                                                                               String query)
                                                                        throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException,
                                                                               org.openbase.jul.exception.MultiException
        Method returns a trigger config based on the input label and query. The ontologyChange will be parsed from the input query.
        Parameters:
        label - is the label of the trigger.
        query - is the query of the trigger.
        Returns:
        the trigger config.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input label or query is null.
        org.openbase.jul.exception.MultiException - is thrown in case the ontologyChange could not be parsed from the input query.

      • buildTriggerConfig

        public rst.domotic.ontology.TriggerConfigType.TriggerConfig buildTriggerConfig(String label,
                                                                               String query,
                                                                               rst.domotic.ontology.OntologyChangeType.OntologyChange ontologyChange)
        Method returns the trigger config based on input label, query and ontologyChange.
        Parameters:
        label - is the label of the trigger.
        query - is the query of the trigger.
        ontologyChange - is the ontologyChange (categories, service types, unit types) of the trigger.
        Returns:
        the trigger config.
